name: Westbrook Bulky Waste Program
materials: Bed Mattresses; Box Springs; Carpet; Furniture
notes: After purchasing a bulky waste tag from City Hall, place items curbside for collection making sure that the orange bulky waste tag is visible. Once items are curbside, call Public Services at 207-854-0660 to alert us that the item is awaiting pick up. Collection typically occurs with 48 hours but this may vary.
